Author: ManicPixieBallerina
Text: It's bulky. There are huge pads meant for the lumbar area, and it doesn't sit smoothly under clothing. It's restrictive but without the nip in.

Author: WantAPerfectSoul
Text: I've had a similar thing happen to me - you being tagged isn't actually based on anything, you just happened to get randomly pulled from your cousin's friend list. Try not to let it get to you <3     I am also interested in hearing more about your support thing btw. Not sure how different it is from spanx... for me, spanx makes a bit of a difference under tight clothing, but not too much.
